description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.
title: Ram Attack

run_speed.title: Run Speed
run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.

ram_speed.title: Ram Speed
ram_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

ram_distance.title: Ram Distance
ram_distance.description: The distance at which the mob start to run with ram speed.

on_start.title: Event: On Start
on_start.description: The event to trigger when attacking.

baby_knockback_modifier.title: Baby Knockback Modifier
baby_knockback_modifier.description: The modifier to knockback that babies have.

cooldown_range.title: Cooldown Range
cooldown_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (positive, in seconds) between each attempted ram attack.

knockback_force.title: Knockback Force
knockback_force.description: The force of the knockback of the ram attack.

knockback_height.title: Knockback Height
knockback_height.description: The height of the knockback of the ram attack.

min_ram_distance.title: Minimum Ram Distance
min_ram_distance.description: The minimum distance at which the mob can start a ram attack.

pre_ram_sound.title: Pre Ram Sound Event
pre_ram_sound.description: The sound to play when an entity is about to perform a ram attack.

ram_impact_sound.title: Ram Impact Sound Event
ram_impact_sound.description: The sound to play when an entity is impacting on a ram attack.
